name: Discball
description:
DISCBALL

A little tennis game I made to familiarise myself with some of Unity's functions. Probably more fun to make than to actually play. The source code of this project is available on my GitHub page at: 

https://github.com/Jcuperus/disc-ball

Controls KeyFunctionWASD/Arrow KeysMoveMouseAimMouse 1/ControlShoot Disc

Feel free to use the comment section underneath for feedback or bug reports.
